question: Which state to host the 6th edition of India's premier open water swimming competition "Swimmathon"?
explanation: The sixth edition of India\'s premier open water swimming competition \" Swimmathon\" will be held at Colva beach in South Goa on December 3, 2017. The event had been accredited by the Swimming Federation of India (SFI) as the national selection trials. This year, the event will have four categories for both men and women. Around 1000 participants are expected to participate in the event across various categories.
